txt.en: 'Greetings, [placeholder]. Our scouts have spotted a caravan of waggons being escorted by Ekhamâti soldiers that appears to be filled with supplies and weapons.\n\n'We require your help in intercepting these waggons so that we can salvage any valuables and provide them to Mizâdi's forces.'
Your mission is to intercept a caravan of waggons filled with supplies and weapons, defeat and soldiers guarding it, and turn over the caravan to Mizâdi's forces.
'I am glad to see you.\n\n'I have heard of your success. The supplies you secured from the caravan will help greatly in our war efforts. Thank you.'
There is no twist in this mission.
Your mission is to intercept a caravan of waggons filled with supplies and weapons, defeat and soldiers guarding it, and turn over the caravan to Mizâdi's forces.
Complete Mission: The Waggons of War
Your mission is to intercept a caravan of waggons filled with supplies and weapons, defeat and soldiers guarding it, and turn over the caravan to Mizâdi's forces.\n\nSpeak to Setokúli to travel.
Your mission is to intercept a caravan of waggons filled with supplies and weapons, defeat and soldiers guarding it, and turn over the caravan to Mizâdi's forces.
